comment: Only HSU and SNAGA could be found on the internet - other parties were not found.
No Wikipedia page for this party.
This party was established under the name PAMETNO but was then renamed to CENTAR.
No information about political orientation found on website.
This party ceased to exist in 2008 and is now HDSSB.
The party refuses to be characterized as being left or right and claims adherence to humanist values
